article_title: Take It From A Restaurant Executive: Obamacare Is Shifting Workers Into Part-Time Jobs

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: Given the massive effort behind convincing us that ObamaCare is a resounding success, it’s almost surprising that a recent NBC News/Wall Street Journal Poll found support languishing at 34%. Part of the problem is the credibility ObamaCare supporters lose by attempting to prove two questionable propositions. First, that Obamacare is having a positive impact on our health care system and, second, that it’s doing so without any negative impact on our economy.
